function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Reduced funding for protected and conserved areas (APC) due to COVID-19 pandemic and related economic outcomes.","Impact":"Threat to the financial sustainability of APCs, leading to inadequate protection and conservation efforts.","Mitigation":"Diversifying funding sources, improving spending efficiency, increasing international funding, and involving local communities in governance and benefits.","Technologies":"Financial management systems, fundraising platforms, and tourism revenue generation tools.","People":"Communities relying on protected areas, conservation organizations, government agencies responsible for APCs.","Owner":"Governments, conservation organizations, international funding agencies, local community representatives."}]}
